arts.ttl: European football: lifelong Roma fan Pellegrini takes down Lazio in derby
arts.sum: Under-fire captain helps extend Ranieri’s perfect record Dembélé’s last-gasp strike wins French Super Cup for PSG Claudio Ranieri extended his perfect record in the Italian capital derby as Roma beat Lazio 2-0 in Serie A to give the Giallorossi a much-needed boost in what has been a difficult season. Roma’s captain and lifelong club fan, Lorenzo Pellegrini, scored a superb opener with a curling shot from the edge of the area to end his long wait for a goal. Then Alexis Saelemaekers finished off a counterattack to give Roma a two-goal advantage after 18 minutes. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Lazio Fall Short in Roma Derby as Claudio Ranieri Outfox Marco Baroni
arts.sum: Lazio coach Marco Baroni suffered his first Derby della Capitale defeat as Roma boss Claudio Ranieri prevailed over his old student. The Lineups The Biancocelseti manager adopted a 4-2-3-1 formation, with Fisayo Dele-Bashiru supporting Taty Castellanos upfront, while Gustav Isaksen and Mattia Zaccagni took the wings. Matteo Guendouzi and Nicolo Rovella started in the double […] The post Lazio Fall Short in Roma Derby as Claudio Ranieri Outfox Marco Baroni appeared first on The Laziali.

arts.ttl: Claudio Ranieri was the Tinkerman. He's the Derbyman now after his Roma team beats Lazio again
arts.sum: Ranieri extended his perfect record in the capital derby as Roma beat Lazio 2-0 in Serie A on Sunday to give the Giallorossi a much-needed boost in what has been a difficult season. Ranieri improved his record to five wins in five derbies as Roma’s coach.
